nodes.text: The Pembric Security Legionnaires were Pembric II's spaceport and possible planetary security force under the Pembric Security Legion. Each Legionnaire wore a white uniform, blast helmet and vest. Primarily Human, they patrolled in groups of five or six, and were heavily armed. In 8 ABY, Chief Magistrate Kebbo led the Legionnaires. They enforced the will of the Bombaasa Cartel on Pembric II, and were used to quell civilian protesters at Erwithat Spaceport. By 19 ABY, they were led by Lieutenant Maxiti.
